#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
if(b==0)
return a;
return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
int t;
long long int a,b,z;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
cin>>a>>b;
int f=0;
while(f==0)
{
z=gcd(a,b);
b=b/z;
if(b==1)
{
cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
break;
}
if(z==1)
{cout<<"No"<<endl;
break;
}
}
}
}
